inn1.comm: fullish and swings away late outside off, leaving Guptill prodding and missing
low full toss outside off, pushed to the right of mid-off. A misfield gives Gunathilka a single
good length and on middle, tapped to mid-on
pitched up and on a fourth-stump line, Dilshan drives with firm hands and finds mid-off
short, rising ball outside off at 132ks, Gunathilaka rides it to backward point
Henry slings this down the leg side, Gunathilaka glances and misses. Leg-side wide
short and Henry cranks up to 137ks, the left-hander hangs back and blocks it square on the off side
full at 137ks, leaves Gunathilaka in the channel. He has a leaden-footed push and is beaten on the outside. Swing for Henry
full and outside off, Gunathilaka frees his arms, hits through the line. Pumped up and over mid-off
pretty full and on middle and leg, nudged to short midwicket as Gunathilaka sets off. A direct hit could have put him in trouble
length and nibbles away outside off, guided to third man
dug in short on middle and leg, Dilshan swivel-pulls it with control. Helped to long leg
banged in short at 146ks, Gunathilaka does not flinch. He skips back and pulls over midwicket
back of a length and outside off, punched to backward point

NZ appeal for caught behind. Not given by umpire Jones. Milne wants a review. Nice and full, slanting away outside off, Gunathilaka flirts with it before pulling his bat away rather belatedly. Hot Spot picks up a faint nick, and the on-field call is overturned. There was a spike on RTS as well.
good length and around off, pushed to the covers
full and hurled at 147s, defended
sliding into the pads, worked behind square on the leg side
pitched up and angled away outside off, Thirimane does not chase it
short and climbs outside off, Thirimanne is up on his tippy toes as he cuts it past backward point
bumper on a leg-stump line, boings off the surface to the keeper. Dilshan shaped for a hook but bailed out at the last instant
length and ducks back in to rap the front pad, above the knee-roll. It may have sneaked down the leg side as well

a touch too full and outside off, Dilshan cracks a drive in the gap between covers and mid-off for his first four. Baz chases hard, as always, but can't swat the ball in, despite a slide at the edge of the boundary
back of a length and slanting away outside off, ignored
length ball on middle, defended
back of a length, wicket-to-wicket line, tapped to mid-off
bouncer outside off, Thiri weaves away and takes evasive action
overpitched and outside off, sweet-looking bent-knee drive but straight to point
back of a length and on a fourth-stump line at 149ks, kept out
good length and on middle, Thiri answers with a solid defence

The short ball nabs Dilshan. Banged in shortish and outside off, hustling Dilshan. He is a bit late onto the pull, top-edging it to midwicket, where the debutant Nicholls snags the catch above the eyes. Henry exults
short and outside off, left alone
back of a length and outside off, that's punched into the covers
skiddy back-of-a-length ball, Thiri gets across in defence, dropping it in front of midwicket
pitched up and swings in, defended back to Henry
full and outside off, Thirimanne bends forward to drive, but mis-hits it back to the bowler. That rounds off a wicket maiden
back of a length and shapes in at 147ks, Chandimal defends it onto the pitch
probing line on off, Milne touches 150ks, tapped defensively to mid-off
short and on off, Chandimal keeps back and glances it behind square on the leg side
short and zips away outside off, bursts off the surface. Thirimanne is lured into wafting at it. Beaten
back of a length and outside off at 150ks, slapped to the left of backward point. Thiri can't find the gap, again
leaping short ball, angled away outside off, Thiri offers no stroke
good length, angled in and swerves away outside off, squaring Chandi up. He has a loose poke and misses
Chandi ventures across the off stump, the quick slides it down the leg side
back of a length and outside off as Chandimal watches it through to the keeper
short and on off, clipped through backward square leg

The dot-ball pressure gets to Thiri. The finger goes up as Henry has his second. Full and swings back in, Thiri gets his front leg across and is trapped in front, hit well below the knee-roll in line with middle. Chandi prompts Thiri not to take the review

Smartly taken by Latham. This is a big, big wicket, Mathews is gone for a first-ball duck. Full and swings away outside off, Mathews nibbles at it and nicks it behind. Latham dives to his left at second slip and completes an impressive, low catch
Siriwardana averts the hat-trick. Full and speared on middle, defended with a straight bat
pitched up and on off, driven past cover
bumper down the leg side, Chandi takes shelter by ducking under it
full and aimed at off, 147ks, Chandimal plays a wristy drive to backward point
good length and curls away outside off, dabbed to backward point

ooof, nearly another wicket. Back of a length and outside off, Chandi attacks it. He slaps and thickly edges it over the head of third slip. Guptill leaps off his feet, gets both hands, and tips it away towards third man. It will go down as a dropped chance, but it was a difficult one
angled in and swings away, beating the groping bat
pitched up and outside off, Chandimal handsomely drives it to mid-off
short ball on off as Chandimal quells it in front of cover

Henry brings the cordon into play again. He is on fire! Teasing fuller length awayswinger outside off, leaving Chandimal poking loosely. He edges it and Taylor, playing his 300th match for NZ, takes it at first slip around waist height
pitched up and on middle, neatly pushed through mid-on
Henry tests Kapu with a bouncer outside off. He bends his back and sways away from the line of harm
back of a length and on middle, Siriwardana camps back and blocks it in front of midwicket
similar length and slanting away outside off, helped down to third man
shortish and angled in at 145ks, defended
Milne pings the channel outside off, Kapu does not bite
pitched up on off at 143ks, driven straight to backward point
short and jags back in, Kapu lets it pass to the keeper
back of a length and around off, forward and defensively pushed to cover
dug in short, Siri sees the width outside off, that's an escape route. He cuts it firmly to the right of point
similar length, but the line is much closer to off to foil an attempted encore from Siriwardana. Chopped to point
Crunchy! Pitched up and outside off, he lunges forward and unfurls a pretty-looking drive past cover
back of a length and on middle, defended
Henry goes full now as Siriwardana pushes it to mid-off with a straight bat
back of a length and slanting away outside off from over the stumps, that's a good 20ks fewer than Milne. Kapu hops and defends
similar length and keeps going away with the angle, patted towards point
short on middle, McClenaghan ramps it up to 136ks, defended on the back foot
back of a length and attacking the stumps, Kapu gets across and drops it defensively to the leg side
McClenaghan fires it outside off, Kapu jabs his bat down but is late on it. He can't squeeze it out
good length and around off, Kapu is caught in a tangle. He nearly popped a return catch
glanced to long leg; Stop the press, Siriwardana becomes the first SL batsman to move into double figures
back of a length and bursts from the surface. He fends it awkwardly to the off side
Henry pounds the deck again. Shortish, blocked off the back foot
back of a length and on off, dabbed towards point
dug in short again as Kapu defends it off the back foot
pitched up and outside off, driven nicely but mid-off hunts it down
McClenaghan bangs a bouncer outside off, Siri rocks his head out of the way

Nicholls now puts it down. Dug in outside off, Siri attempts a pull. He miscues it over midwicket. The local lad runs in, slides early. Goes with both hands and shells it as his knee hits the ground. He can't secure it on the rebound either
back of a length ball, blocked
short and outside off, Siri pulls again, this time with better control. Played over mid-on
short and outside off, Siri is up on his tippy toes as he blocks towards poinr
Siri fetches the pull from outside off but deep midwicket hunts it down. Siri rolled his wrists well to keep it down
bouncer with more sting, targetting the head of Siri. He manages to duck under it
full and holds its line on off, defended back to Bracewell
good length and on off, bunted defensively to mid-off
full and on middle and leg, flicked in the space between midwicket and mid-on
full and outside off, Siri eases it through mid-off with a straight bat
Siri looks like he is batting on a different pitch. Full and outside off, this was not a half-volley. He leans forward and threads the gap at cover with another beautiful drive
wicket-to-wicket stuff from Bracewell, solidly blocked back to the bowler
Kapu now springs into action. Full and angled away outside off, he brings out a drive of his own, creaming it past the covers
the bowler pulls his length back and makes Kapu hop. Dabbed into the leg side for one
McClenaghan bangs a lifter, that soars over a ducking Siri to the keeper. Ducked under
short and outside off, another well-controlled pull through backward square leg. Baz, believe it or not, can't back the throw up cleanly and gives away an extra run
another lifting ball, Siri sinks under it
having got done with two bouncers for the over, the bowler hits a good length now. Pushed defensively to off
picked away off the pads through midwicket
full and on middle, Siri tips forward and pushes to mid-on
length and outside off, bent-knee drive to deep cover
bouncer outside off, Kapu sways his upper body out of the way

Kapu hits it into the lap of Santner at short cover; much like target practice. Fuller length and outside off, Kapu throws his hands at an aerial drive. Straightforward catch for Santner. SL's recovery is broken as Kapu tosses it away on return
he is welcome with a rising ball. Blocked carefully
dug in outside off, Kula lets it harmlessly pass to the keeper
length and comes in, poked towards point
Siri rides the bounce of this short offering outside off and steers it behind point
short and rises on middle. Siri rises with it and fends it to the leg side
short and helped behind square with a calm pull
full and aimed at off, patted to the covers
full and angled away outside off, Kula flashes a drive and only connects with thin air
back of a length and just a shade outside off, Siri is nailed to the crease as he jabs at it... the inside edge sneaks past the leg stump
shortish and seeking the top of off, angled towards point
Bracewell fires a bouncer, not much shoulder power in it. Siri ducks under it
good length and on middle, defended on the front foot
full and on middle, blocked to cover
length and outside off, steered to backward point
back of a length and outside off, sliced to third man off the outer half
short and outside off, pulled to deep midwicket for one
pitched up and attacking the off stump, Kula's defence intervenes
bumper down the leg side as Kula ducks under. This soars to the keeper and is deemed a wide
full and on off at 143ks, driven, but firmly through mid-off and cover
tight line on off, defended to cover
banged in and hurries onto Kula, who is left in a tangle. Awkwardly fended to the leg side
pitched up and outside off, driven strongly to cover where Santner makes a sharp save, diving to his right
pitched up on off, Siri skewers a drive to mid-on
short and outside off, slapped to backward point
back of a length and on middle, Siri gets behind the line and blocks
Bracewell nails a yorker, right in the blockhole. Siri brings his bat down hurriedly and squirts it out
short and outside off, glided to backward point
rising ball on off, Kula hops and diffuses it
Kula says enough of poking, prodding, fending, ducking and weaving. He takes this short ball from outside off and dispatches it over deep midwicket
short and hurled on off at 148ks, Kula is back to defending
Kula is up on his toes again to defend this short ball on midle
bumper on the leg stump, one for the over. Kula hunkers down and gets out of the way
more short-ball attack. Kula leaps across off and defends it onto the pitch
short and outside off, not short enough. Siri rolls his wrists, swivels and pulls it over backward square leg
overpitched and on off, driven to mid-off, where Baz throws himself to his left and stops the ball
pitched up on off, Siri hunts for a cover-drive and ends up mis-timing it past midwicket off the inside half
Bracewell slices Kula into half with an inducker. Seams back in, beats the inside edge and bounces over middle and off
fullish and around off, Kula drives, nearly spooning it to Santner at short cover. Kula was touch early into the shot, the ball drops short of Santner
length and outside off, pushed into the covers
full and on middle, dabbed to short third man
worked off the pads through backward square leg
drifting down the leg side, deflected to short fine leg
darted short and outside off, punched off the back foot in front of square on the off side
straight roller on middle, Siri bends forward to defend it
back of a length and on middle, turned to square leg as Siri sits back
full and on middle and leg, clipped past mid-on for three
back of a length and on off, played back to the bowler
pitched up and outside off, Kula lays into an aerial drive, eludes Baz at mid-off. Hit to the left of the diving NZ captain
Bracewell retorts with a lifter, forcing Kula to duck under it
pretty full and on off, whipped towards midwicket
full and on middle and leg, milked to the leg side for one more
slides on middle, defensively dabbed in front of point
shortish and outside off, whipped between midwicket and square leg
quicker and drifts in at 90ks to strike the front pad. But this would have slipped down leg
length ball on off, defended on the back foot
pushed through on off, blocked again
darted flat, Kula goes low on one knee and slams it over midwicket with a slog sweep for a flat six! That brings up the 100 for the visitors
short and outside off, flayed to third man
full and shapes away with the angle outside off, Kula isn't interested
back of a length with a hint of extra bounce to sock the batsman on the mid-riff region
pitched up and just a shade outside off, Kula lashes a drive through the covers, outruns a chasing Baz
back of a length on middle as Kula covers up in defence
tight line on off, blocked back to the bowler
Siri jumps out of the crease, Santner pulls his length back. Quietly knocked to the leg side
flat leg-stump ball, tickled behind square for one
short and wide outside off, Kula attacks it, slashing it over to third man
drifts in full on middle, blocked on the front foot
slides on with the arm outside off, cut and a miss
flighted on off, blocked back to the bowler off the front foot
back of a length and outside off, solidly punched out to deep point
short ball on off, Kula leaps off his feet and defends to short cover
banged in short on middle, dragged towards midwicket. 50 partnership elicits applause from the smattering of SL fans
dug in short and put away. He has been impressive against the short ball; quite fitting that he reaches his fifty with a pull. Crunched away to the cow corner boundary
pitched up, driven nicely to the off side but Siri can't find the gap now
full at off, driven to mid-off again
turn and bounce outside off! Poked to short third man
loopier on off, defended
this one is flat and full, squeezed to short fine leg off an inside edge
short and wide outside off, sliced between the two men behind square on the off side
diverted off the pads behind square
pitched up and outside off, Kula laces a drive to cover
short and wide outside off, slapped away to third man
well-directed bouncer outside off at 139ks, Kula is up to the challenge as well, watching it all along before swaying away
width outside off, slashed to third man with some flourish
bouncer down the leg side as Siri ducks under. This one's a wide
the bowler hammers it fractionally short, Siri gets behind the line in defence
back of a length and on off, guided to backward point
very full and shoots low on middle. Siri stoops low with it to keep it out somehow
pushed through on off at 92ks, blocked
swept from outside off to deep backward square leg
fired at 93ks, down the pitch and dragged to long-on
darted quick again, the line is on off. Jabbed back to Santner
flighted on off, flicked straight to short midwicket
Kula skips back, looks to cut this short ball outside off. Chopped towards point
back of a length and on middle, defended
banged in short and outside off, it does not bother Siri. Pulled in front of square
full and outside off, Siri drills a drive past the diving cover fielder
full at middle, defended back
full and outside off, Siri leans forward as he plays another flowy drive. Eased to deep cover
back of a length and on off, turned to leg
slides on off, punchily played to cover
darted outside off, dragged to deep midwicket with a slog sweep
Siri uses his feet and quietly blocks this full ball
nudged off the pads through backward square leg
Kula jumps down the pitch, manufactures a full ball and drills it back to the bowler, who dives to his right in his follow through and makes a half save
worked towards short midwicket, where Guptill slips before gathering the ball. Siri hunts for a risky single but is sent back by Kula
bang! Length and outside off, Kula sizes it up and launches it over long-on
short on off, defended
back of a length and on off, jabbed towards point
Henry sucks pace off this one outside off, Kula chases it, does so early. Drive and a miss
135ks bouncer outside off but Kula sways his head out of the way
too full and straight, whipped through the vacant space at midwicket
pitched up on middle, Siri uses his feet and taps it to cover
length ball on off, nudged in front of square
straighter one on off, Kula defends with bat and pad close together
clean and effective! Kula raises his fifty with a six, his fourth of the match. Tossed up and outside off, he dances out and lifts it over long-off
flat and on the pads, neatly tucked behind square
Siri manufactures room, Santner chases him. Chopped to short third man. He rushes across to the other end and beats the direct throw
Siri steps away outside leg, the bowler bangs it short. The left-hander looks to force it away through the off side but has to settle with an edge behind
bouncer and Siri rocks his head out of the way
dug in outside off, Siri brings out another of those controlled pulls and sends it to deep midwicket
slower short ball at 112ks. Kula picks it up and nails it. Swung away over long-on
another short ball, this one kicks up further, keeping Kula to a defence
short and just a shade outside off, Kula rides the bounce and plays it towards point
yorker on middle and leg, jammed to mid-on
another yorker-length ball, this is jabbed back at the bowler
dug in on a fourth-stump line, Siri rocks back and pulls it to deep midwicket
full ball on off, push-driven through mid-on

Siri skies it, Baz settles under it! Full, offcutting slower ball on middle as Bracewell tricks Siri. He attempts a leg-side slog and skewers it to mid-off. Siri, though, has added 56 after he was spilled by Nicholls
back of a length and outside off with extra bounce, left alone
pitched up and leaves Mendis in the channel. He sticks his bat out and is beaten on the outside
full and slants away outside off, poked past second slip off an outside edge
back of a length and on off, blocked

Ronchi pulls off a stunner! He flies to his right and takes a one-handed ripper. Kula shows his ace early as he jumps outside leg. McClenaghan follows the batsman and finds extra bounce. This might have been a slippery slower one. Kula has a big whoosh, slashing it behind. It looked to run away fine to third man... until Ronchi intervened. The fast-travelling ball nearly bounced out of the glove, but Ronchi managed to hang onto it
back of a length and on off, Chameera, the new man, covers up in defence
pitched up on the stumps, pushed down the ground
low full toss on off, tapped towards mid-off, where Baz flings to his left and takes some pace off the ball
back of a length and on middle, defended back
full on middle, Chameera hangs back and keeps it out
tight line on off, poked to cover
full and on a fifth-stump line, Chameera keeps back and shuts his bat down on the ball
bouncer outside off, Chameera attempts a flamingo pull... but only connects with thin air
Mends races down the track, the bowler is wary of it as he drags his length back outside off. Wild swing and a miss
lifting ball outside off, gets big on Mendis, who can't hook it away. Beaten again
short and on middle, he can't ramp it over to third man
Mendis can't put bat on ball! He skips out again, gets another short ball
Mendis puts bat onto ball now, he gloves it behind to the keeper. He shuffles away outside leg, manufactures some room. Mendis can only tamely fend it to Ronchi. This is a simpler catch
full and fired on off, blocked back to the bowler
bouncer, ducked under
hurled on off, full in length. Kept out
yorker nailed at the base of off, dug out
back-to-to back yorkers. Squeezed out again
lifter down the leg side, Chameera shelves the hook. He sinks under it
full and tails back in, squirted behind square off an inside edge
short ball, gets big on the batsman. Hooked with a top edge over square leg
bouncer on the leg stump, ducked under
banged in short again, Chameera hunkers down
another bouncer, this one is from round the stumps. Chameera ducks under it
length and outside off, scooped wide of cover
dug in on middle, Lakmal takes this on. Dragging a pull to the right of Baz at mid-on, after clearing the front leg
the short-ball barrage continues. This one is directed on a leg-stump line as Chameera slips under it
Milne aims for the yorker. He has to settle with a low full toss, which is pushed through mid-off
Milne fires a 144ks yorker, dug out
back of a length and outside off, Chameera. The batsman has a wild swing and a miss
even shorter and down leg, Chameera takes evasive action
inch-perfect inswinging yorker. Dug out again
slanted into the pads, Lakmal misses the flick
rank long hop, and Santner escapes punishment. Pulled in front of square
slid through on middle at 90ks, blocked back
slog-swept away behind square. Santner gave this more air
shortish on off, turned to midwicket
worked behind square off the back foot
full and outside off, the batsman throws his bat at a drive and slices it behind point
lifting short ball, Chameera keeps his eyes on it before sinking under it
hacked away for four! Back of a length and on middle, Chameera makes swinging room and slugs it over mid-on
Chameera ventures outside leg again, Bracewell follows him with a shortish ball. Scooped out of reach of backward point

Lakmal is socked on the side of the helmet. Bouncer, hurries onto Lakmal, who takes his eyes off this, and gets pinged on the grille. The back guard on the helmet slips out. The physio is out to tend to Lakmal. He looks shaken up
Bracewell wraps up Sri Lanka for 188. Dug in short and outside off, Lakmal skips back and pulls it to Latham at deep midwicket

inn2.comm: creamed! Floated too full and outside off, Guptill drives it, sending it whistling past the covers
Kula brings this back in on off, Guptill squirts it behind square off an inside edge
shortish and outside off, Baz goes deep in the crease and cuts it to backward point
full and swings around off, Baz is squared up as he pokes it to the off side
short and width outside off, Baz punishes it. He rocks back and nails a square cut
good length and on off, blocked back
back of a length and outside off, punchily played to cover
Lakmal's slower ball is all messed up as he slides it down the leg side at 119ks
short ball at off, Guptill punches it back to Lakmal
back of a length and outside off, Guptill aims to force it away... but mis-hits it to mid-off
length and on off, Guptill checks his lofted hit after extending his arms. Chipped over mid-on
short ball, which is pinged to the man at cover
Baz runs down the track and lashes it over the covers for four more!
full and on middle, Baz keeps back and pushes to mid-on
full and on middle, Baz swings it to mid-on off the inside half
good length and on off, Guptill punches it in the gap at cover
clipped off the pads to square leg
full and swings in on off, inside-edged onto the pad
slashed in the air between slip and the keeper! Baz does not know to hold back... He jumps out, makes room, as he goes for a big hoick. Gets the result he was aiming, though
banged in on a leg-stump line, Baz attacks it. He sends it flying over fine leg off a top edge. One-bounce four
Baz steps away outside leg, Lakmal follows the NZ captain and hits the pad
too straight in line, whipped past midwicket off the back foot
Baz shuffles away outside leg, Lakmal hurls a yorker. Baz adjusts and digs it out
pretty full on the leg stump, Baz, who was standing outside leg, jabs it towards mid-on
full on middle, drilled down the ground but mid-off has it covered
low full toss on middle, Baz slinks outside leg and flays it to cover, where Thiri comes up with a good stop, flinging to his left
back of a length, punched to cover
full at middle, Guptill brings out his carving knife and slices it over backward point
short, slower ball. Guptill waits for it to arrive and pummels a pull over midwicket. The back-of-the-hand slower ball goes awry. Guptill met that 109ks ball on the front foot
back of a length and outside off, Guptill is more circumspect now as he pats it to point with an open face
short and outside off, sits up to be hit. Baz pounces on it, pulling it over midwicket off the back foot
Baz makes room outside leg, Lakmal follows him. But Baz is unperturbed, jabbing it to deep midwicket
this is a Guptill special! Good length and on middle, he extends his arms and lofts it straight down the ground with great authority
bouncer outside off, he swivels. Hooks and misses
Lakmal lets rip an inswinging yorker. Guptill manages to dig it out
bouncer, Guptill shaped to perhaps ramp it away before bailing out at the last instant
fractionally short and on off, Baz greets his opposite number with a pulled six over backward square leg. That exploded from the middle of the bat
Baz throws his bat at it, literally. Big baseball swing after stepping away. The bat flies behind square. The ball flies over cover
bouncer, Guptill bends his back and gets out of the way
leg-side wide
short and on middle and leg, Guptill stands tall and punches it through mid-on
dug in short and outside off, Baz creates more swinging room by backing away, and cutting it over backward point.
smeared through covers now! Back of a length and on a fourth-stump line. Baz backs away and says "bombs away"
slides on outside off, chopped to cover
hint of quick turn, bunted towards midwicket
dropped short on middle, that's a belated Christmas gift. He rocks back and crunches a pull to the midwicket boundary
Baz uses his feet, throws Mendis off course. He did not middle it; he ends up dragging it to the cow corner boundary after taking an attempted carrom ball on the full
pushed through, more sedate stuff. Blocked back
another buccaneering fifty in Baz's CV! Width and outside off, slashed over the covers. He raises his bat and acknowledges his 23-ball half-century
flat and quick, drilled down the ground for a couple
Guptill marches down the pitch, manufactures a full toss and drives it between covers and mid-off
pitched up and outside off, Guptill uses his feet, meets the pitch and smokes a six over long-off
slides on off, patted in front of cover
darted outside off, drilled to long-off
pushed through, Baz charges down the pitch and punts it over mid-on. He continues to race along like a bullet train
back of a length on middle, sticks in the pitch. Chipped in front of short midwicket
Chameera generates good pace, 141ks, but veers down the leg side. 100 up already for NZ
short, rising ball. Guptill hops and blunts it
another leg-wide wide
short and on the hips, glanced behind square
short and down the leg side, Guptill picks up and helps it to the left of short fine leg
short and hurries on at 144ks, Guptill pops it... in front of Chameera
Chameera slides another wide, slung down leg at 148ks
lifting ball outside off, Guptill gets on top of the bounce and steers to backward point. NZ: 108 for 0 in 10 overs. SL were 29 for 5 at the same point in their innings

Siri breaks NZ's racy opening stand. He gives this more air as Baz jumps down the pitch. He wants to launch it perhaps over cover. Baz does not get hold of the hit as he slices it to Lakmal at backward point
short ball on middle and leg, pulled strongly in front of square
dipping full toss on middle, bunted to long-on
arrows in with the arm on middle, blocked back
slid down leg, slog-swept over backward square leg with a top edge. Guptill brings up a fifty of his own
length ball on a fourth-stump line, angled to backward point
fractionally short and outside off, cut away past backward point. Latham looks to run hard for four but has to settle with three
full and outside off, jammed out to cover
may have been a carrom ball, tapped to point
skids off the deck with extra bounce, defended on the back foot
clipped from middle and leg to midwicket
slides on outside off, Latham leans back and finds the gap at backward point. This time that timing was better
poor ball, duly dispatched. Darted down leg, slog-swept over backward square leg
short and wide outside off now, flayed to cover
loopier and outside off, Guptill thrashes a drive to long-off
pitched up on off, drop-and-run single in front of cover
Siri gives this loads of air. Guptill loves the flight. He comes down the pitch and swings it over cow corner
slides on outside off, cracked behind point
fired down the leg side
full and spins away, flash and a miss
darted outside off, Guptill rifles a punch through the covers. He rocked back and punished it
quicker through the air, turned to leg
pitched up on off, Guptill drills a drive, straight down the ground
Mendis pushes another one down leg, beats Latham's sweep, beats the keeper as well
full and on middle, neatly driven to midwicket
short and wide outside off, Latham likes it there. Cut away between covers and backward point
short and on middle, defended to off
overpitched on middle, driven to mid-off for one
short ball on off, Guptill gets behind the line in defence
banged in short and outside off, but not much sting in it. Guptill goes back, and drums a pull to the midwicket boundary
bouncer on a leg-stump line, the batsman ducks under it
width outside off, Guptill leaps off his feet and slashes it through the off-side gap for four more
tossed up on middle, defended on the front foot
full on off, Latham dances out and lofts it sweetly over mid-on
flicked past midwicket off the back foot
drifting down the leg side, glanced to long leg

bowled'em. Consolatory wicket for Dilshan and SL. Tossed up, Latham wants to loft it over mid-on again but fails this time as he yorks himself. Dilshan sneaks through the gate and disturbs the furniture to light up the zing bails
dropped short, Taylor sits back and punches it to long-on to get off the mark
flighted on off, Taylor gets forward and across to block it
down the pitch and Taylor secures a single to long-off
Guptill holes out to long-off! Pushed outside off, Guptill slams it flat.. right into the hands of Kulasekara. It's all too late for Sri Lanka, though
looped up on off, defended on the front foot
full at off, down the pitch and flicked to midwicket
dragged short and outside off, the debutant tucks into it as he cuts it away past the covers. He would be breathing easy now
worked off the pads towards square leg
twirled off the pads to midwicket
slides on middle, punched off the back foot to mid-off
full and on middle, Nicholls dead-bats it
Nicholls hangs back and plays a whippy punch through midwicket
slanted down the leg side, wide called
pitched up on middle, Taylor gets across in defence
speared short and down the leg side, tripe ball, helped away fine for four
full and outside off, laced past the covers for back-to-back fours
flat and on the pads, swept away... the man at forward short leg takes a blow on his ankle
fired quick at 93ks, raps the pad... Oh wait, Nicholls had jammed it onto his pad off an inside edge to weather the lbw shout
tossed up on middle, blocked
full on middle, the debutant bends forward to defend
flighted on off, Taylor skips out and drives to cover
picked off the pads through midwicket
flighted and outside off, swept away for one
drifts in on middle, blocked on the front foot
Taylor uses his feet again, pushed smoothly to long-off
tucked off the back foot to deep midwicket
fired outside off at 96ks, slapped to cover
pushed through outside off, guided to backward point
full and on middle, patted to mid-off off the front foot
short ball on middle, punched to mid-off
filthy long hop outside off, Nicholls goes deep in the crease and rattles a pull over midwicket

Nicholls, the debutant, puts the seal on NZ's thumping win! Mendis serves up another short ball outside off, this is cracked away past backward point. Nicholls takes in the applause from the home crowd
